Class Gaussian1D

java.lang.Object
algorithms.imageProcessing.Gaussian1D
public class Gaussian1D extends Object
1 ( -(x - mu)^2 ) f = ------------------ * exp( ----------- ) sigma * sqrt(2*pi) ( 2o~^2 )

nichole

    • getKernel

      public static float[] getKernel(float sigma)
      get the kernel for sigma and deltaX. To create the x-axis for the kernel: 
             int halfWidthInPixels = kernel.length >> 1; 
       int[] x = new int[kernel.length];
       for (int i = 0; i < x.length; i++) {
            x[i] = i + (int) (mu - halfWidthInPixels);
       }
      Parameters:
      sigma -
      Returns:

    • getKernel

      public static float[] getKernel(SIGMA sigma)
      get the kernel for sigma. To create the x-axis for the kernel: 
             int halfWidthInPixels = kernel.length >> 1; 
       int[] x = new int[kernel.length];
       for (int i = 0; i < x.length; i++) {
            x[i] = i + (int) (mu - halfWidthInPixels);
       }
      Parameters:
      sigma -
      Returns:
